description.en: IceSlush Finance is a yield farming protocol on the Avalanche Network. Users will be able to stake their native or non-native tokens to earn yields in both the Farms (LP) or Pools (single-asset staking). There is a future plan to incorporate NFTs into the IceSlush ecosystem. Our contracts are Paladin audited and we have undergone review and KYC with RugDoc and have been rated as Low Risk.
